english.unauthorized_command: You are not authorized to use this command.
english.no_words_language: No words found for the specified language.
english.quiz_ongoing: A quiz is already ongoing in this chat! Use /stop to stop it.
english.no_words_specific_language: No words found for the specified language "{language}".
english.quiz_started:
Started timed Quiz with language: {language}!
Here's the first one:
english.incorrect_answer: Incorrect. You have {remaining_attempts} attempts left. Try again by replying to this message.
english.incorrect_outdated: Incorrect or outdated answer. Try again with a new question!
english.idk_answer: Gave up already? Here's your answer: {correct_answer}
english.reply_to_question: Please reply directly to the question.
english.quiz_question: What is the word (in {language}) with given description: {description}?
english.no_bot_language: Please provide a language. Available languages: {available_languages}
english.start_first: Please initiate the quiz first by using the /start command.
english.closeness50: You're somewhat on the right track!
english.language_description: Change the language of the bot.
english.start_description: the timer can be added, for example start 10
english.remove_word_description: any word can be deleted from the list
english.list_no_argument: Please specify a language to list words.
english.list_unknown_group: Unknown language group. Available language groups: {available_groups}
english.list_empty_group: The specified language group is empty.
